entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A few flurries. High minus 5.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the morning then mainly cloudy. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near noon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light overnight. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 07 January 2023
